data.name: Trap Labs Demo
data.detailed_description:
Trap Labs is a action puzzler where you try to run from one side of the room to the other without dying. The demo features ~30 hand made levels that gives you a peek at the single player story, and one online multiplayer co-op map.


The full version includes:

  • 100 levels of single player story that takes you through business practices of Trap Labs
  • Over 100+ challenges arcade mode with Steam leaderboard
  • Race and co-op cross-platform online multiplayer
  • Steam achievements

Coming Mid-2018



Follow us on other sites: @traplabsgame
Website/mailing list: http://traplabs.net
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/traplabsgame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/traplabsgame
Tumblr: https://traplabsgame.tumblr.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/6J7kg3U

data.short_description: Billy needs to dash, Billy wants the cash, run through Trap Labs before Billy gets smashed. Find out what’s hidden deep inside the labs, don’t get Billy turned into trash!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card that supports OpenGL 2.1 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.7 or newer
  • Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card that supports OpenGL 2.1 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
